mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (name, email, content, message_type, is_secret, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{content}, #{messageType}, #{isSecret}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, content, message_type as messageType, created_time as createdTime, is_secret as isSecret, status FROM messages WHERE (is_secret = 0 OR status = 1) ORDER BY created_time DESC
SELECT id, name, email, content, message_type as messageType, created_time as createdTime, is_secret as isSecret, status FROM messages ORDER BY created_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE messages SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
